SUB_W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Hoo-ee! It's freezin' here!
Can see my breath and everything.

SUB_W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Bonnie, look! There are frozen people
and even frozen buildings! Will that
happen to us if we stay here too long?

SUB_W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_WRLD_BOFO_INITIAL_000_CUT_000_02.text: I mean, it's cold, but it ain't that cold. Something's real wrong in this world, so let's just find our triangle and go.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_00.text:
Oh wow, you two aren't frozen!
Boy, am I ever glad to see you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Yes, ma'am, I'm fine. My name's Alexandre.
Are you travelers?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_03.text:
We are. I'm Formina Franklyn, and that's
Bonnie Blair. Everyone around here seems
to be frozen—well, except for you, I guess.
What happened here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_04.text:
I wish I knew. Everything was normal when I went
down into the mine this morning, but when I came
back up? Boom! Everything was frozen solid.
I figure it's because of the curse, but...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So, there was this emperor a long time ago.
He died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze them right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_06.text:
I guess 'eventually' turned out
to be today.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_07.text:
So if this curse froze your whole world,
why ain't you a popsicle? Were you doin'
something in that mine that saved you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_08.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything,
ma'am, I swear! As for why I'm not frozen, the only thing
I can think of is that it has something to do
with these matches I brought into the mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_09.text:
Their light is supposed to ward off evil,
so maybe they kept me from freezing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_10.text:
If those matches really do ward off evil,
I wonder if they could be used to thaw
all of these frozen residents.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_11.text:
Hey, that's a good idea! Will you come
with me while I try to unfreeze people?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_13.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_13.text:
By the way, have you seen any
strange triangles around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_14.text:
Oh, sure! There's a strange triangle
pattern set in the palace gates.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_16.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_000_CUT_000_16.text:
Okay, but you have to promise
to help me unfreeze everyone.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_01.text:
You all right, kid? Not hurt at all?
Oh, and my name's Bonnie Blair,
and that there is Formina Franklyn.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_02.text:
My name's Alexandre. Everything was normal
when I went down into the mine this morning,
but when I came back up? Boom! Frozen solid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_03.text:
So everyone abruptly froze today?
That's rather odd. Incidentally,
have you seen a triangle anywhere?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_04.text:
...A triangle? What are you talking about?
Look, all I care about is unfreezing all these
people, and I don't even know where to start!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, so if this curse froze your whole world,
why ain't YOU frozen? 'Cause when somethin'
terrible happens and one person is mysteriously
unaffected, they're usually responsible.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.text:
So you just happened to have some evil-wardin'
matches that saved you? Story strikes me as a
might outlandish, but I guess I trust you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_10.text:
Yes, this does all seem rather convenient.
Still if those matches really do ward off evil,
maybe they can be used to thaw the frozen people.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_11.text:
So will you two come with me
and try to help the others?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_13.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_100_CUT_000_13.text:
But first, I need to repeat my question:
Have you seen an odd triangle around here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_03.text:
I'm gonna need you to retrace the day's events in
your mind, pardner. Anything unusual happen?
Did you do anything out of the ordinary?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_04.text:
What? No! I didn't do anything, I swear!
It has to be because of the curse! Oh, right. You wouldn't know about that, huh?
So there's an emperor from a long time ago who
died cursing the people of Grelon, saying he'd
eventually freeze 'em right down to their hearts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_05.text:
I'm guessing this is all happening because
of the curse—and that the reason I'm not
frozen is because of these matches.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_07.text:
And where did you get these matches?
Did someone give them to you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_08.text:
I... Oh, weird! I don't know who gave them to me!
I found them in my pocket this morning, which is
why I decided to go into the mine, but everything
before that is a blank.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.text:
So if we find whoever gave Alexandre
those matches, I bet we find the feller
that's behind this whole freezin' mess.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_09.text:
But for what purpose—and why spare this child
in particular? Could this all be some sort of hint
as to the location of our triangle?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_10.text:
Listen here, kid: I bet dollars to donuts
those matches of yours could be used
to unfreeze all the people here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_11.text:
You got the power to save 'em. But at the
same time, this could all be part'a some trap
a villain-type set for us—or even for you.
So do you still wanna do it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_12.text: Yes! I want to save everyone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_13.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_REMNANT_200_CUT_000_13.text:
I like your spirit, kid—and don't you worry,
we'll be right there with you. But first,
have you seen a triangle like this anywhere?

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_800_00.text:
I've only got eight matches left,
which probably won't be enough
to save everyone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_00.text:
We've already used half the matches.
There's only four left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_400_01.text:
Heck, I like to see that as
a matchbook half full.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_00.text: We've only got one match left.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_100_01.text:
Look on the bright side, kid:
you can still save one person!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_00.text:
That was the last match.
We can't save anyone else.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_01.text:
And no one knew jack about our
triangle. We've hit a dead end.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_02.text:
Don't say that! We have to find
a way to save everyone!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_03.text:
If we could get into the final emperor's palace,
we might be able to solve the mystery of the curse—
but that gate's sealed tight by that mysterious triangle.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_04.text:
But that don't mean it's okay to give up.
Let's run through all this again.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_000_CUT_000_07.text:
Don't be too grateful—we're just doing
what we gotta do to get our triangle.
And remember, if you want our help,
you gotta work with us on that.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_01.text:
The only thing we know for certain is that
the final emperor is involved somehow.
Outside'a that, we got jack and squat.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_03.text:
We're certainly not getting anywhere
in terms of the triangle, either. We'll keep investigating, of course, but we
also can't dismiss the possibility that
Alexandre is behind this. Honestly, I'm not
sure if we should keep working with him.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_04.text:
Heck, I can't just abandon the kid like that!
But I reckon that's all the more reason I need
you viewing this through a coldly objective lens.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_05.text:
I'll be honest: I sort of love this
kindly-big-sister side of you.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_06.text:
Hey, I'm a real whip-cracker of a sister!
Ain't that right, Alexandre? Now let's go figure out how to bust into the
final emperor's palace. That means going
through this entire world again with a
fine-tooth comb, so don't fall behind.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_100_CUT_000_07.text:
Okay, ma'am, I won't.
And thank you both.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_03.text:
So long as we don't know who's behind
all of this, I think it's dangerous to leave
Alexandre alone.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MATCHES_200_CUT_000_05.text:
So let's go figure out how to bust into the
final emperor's palace. That means going
through this entire world again with a
fine-tooth comb, so don't fall behind.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_000.text:
Hey, that's Leia! Leia! Hey, Leia!
LEIA, CAN YOU HEAR ME!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_010.text: Calm down, kid. You know this gal?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_020.text:
Oh, Leia is wonderful! She's a scholar
on a survey team who knows all sorts
of fascinating stories about the past.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_030.text:
Sounds mighty impressive. And if she's
a scholar, she may know what caused
your world to freeze.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_040.text:
I'm going to use a match to save her.
Are you ready?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_060.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_999_CUT_000_060.text: Let's give it some more thought.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
My name's Bonnie, and I'm lookin' for
a special triangle. You found anything
like that in all your diggin' around?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
How odd—I'm also looking for a triangle!
It's the key to unlocking the final emperor's
palace, you see, and there's just so much
we could learn about his reign in there!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Then I'm guessin' you
ain't found it yet.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
Correct. But it has to be somewhere in
this world, so I'm going to keep digging.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_200.text:
Then we'll do the same! Well, maybe not
so much with the diggin', but we'll sure
keep our eyes open. Thanks.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_LEIA_000_CUT_000_210.text:
It's I who should be thanking you.
Please look after Alexandre for me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: Hello, Alexandre. What brings you to Duvall?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The library. We're hoping to do
some research on ancient symbols.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text: How scholarly of you! Well, I know you could learn a great deal about them from Nicolas Flamel's Encyclopaedia Alchemica, but I fear it is an extremely dangerous book. Its most important page is protected by mighty guardian beasts charged with keeping its secrets; even Leia from the survey team has decided not to attempt it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
If it's that important of a book,
I'd sure like to give it the once-over.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
In that case, I'll go prepare our
sturdiest room for you. Good luck.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The text says not to touch it, Miss Blair.
So, um... Are you sure you want to?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
The more it tells me not to touch it,
the more I want to.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
I don't think we have enough artifacts
to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MARION_KEYQUEST_000_CU.text:
Then our work ain't done.
Let's go find more artifacts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Boy, this slope sure is steep...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
What are you gettin' so nervous for? 
Oh, lemme guess—you just wanna
look real fancy for Morgane.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Look, this is all really abrupt, okay?
I haven't had time to mentally prepare.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Sorry, I shouldn't tease. Anyway, the whole
point of this is to fail, so you ain't got nothin'
at all to be nervous about!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I know—but I'd still rather do it
right once and impress Morgane!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
It's like that ghost wanted
to show us where it was.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I suppose—but I still don't understand
why it would only come out if we failed
at a skiing challenge.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Next time we see the ghost,
we'll have to ask.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
I did it! I actually pulled it off!
Morgane is going to think I'm SO cool!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
That's some real fine skiing, pardner—
but the whole point here was to fail.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text:
Whoops! That's right. It felt so good
to be skiing that I completely forgot!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MORGANE_KEYQUEST_000_C.text: Let's try that one more time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Dangerous though it may be, we're gonna
have to search these old mining tunnels.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text: I'm counting on you, Miss Blair!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ERIC_KEYQUEST_000_CUT_.text: No sign of any artifacts here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Help! Fiends! Fiends appeared out
of nowhere and tore my fields apart!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wow, that's terrible. Do you think it's
related to the curse of the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I seriously doubt he cares
about that right now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: Well, Alexandre! You saved me again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: We're just glad you ain't hurt.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Guillaume
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
I can't offer much in thanks, but you can
take anything you like from the windmill.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Whatever we want from all this nothin'?
Mighty generous offer there, friend.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: All I see are bags of flour.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Wait, hold on... Isn't this an artifact?
What's it even doing here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
Hey, Guillaume said we could take what we wanted.
Plus, I'm sure he don't wanna be involved in all this
artifact business, so we'll just pocket it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text:
This could be important to Guillaume.
Best ask before we walk off with it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GUILLAUME_QUEST_000_CU.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Have you heard about any ancient artifacts
being found in this mine, Esperance?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
This is a mine, not an archaeological site.
Also, the other mines are still frozen,
and I have my hands VERY full dealing
with all of them at the moment. Now perhaps you can go unfreeze those
other mines and stop pestering me with
all of these inane questions?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Wow, that's some gratitude for you.
Kid unfreezes you, and you give him
the business first chance you get.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
Yes, I suppose he did save my life... My apologies, Alexandre. I've been terribly
busy trying to find out what's going on in
the other mines, and I fear it's left my
temper rather frayed.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
In that case, we'll check them out for you!
If I see anything out of the ordinary,
I'll come let you know right away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text:
That would be a huge help.
Thank you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_100_CU.text: Do be careful out there, all right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
You think maybe we'll wrangle up
an artifact in this here mine?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text: The thought did cross my mind... Let's see what we can find!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ESPERANCE_QUEST_110_CU.text:
Guess I shouldn't have figured
it would come so easy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Why were you so all-fired eager
to pick up the firewood?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text:
Because this could also be
connected to the artifacts!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_000_CUT_.text: I sure hope you're right, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text: I know. Also, this wood was really heavy.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_VIRGILE_QUEST_030_CUT_.text:
Well, at least we can cross this place
off the list. That's a positive!

SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: Hang on, I think an artifact just fell out! So Virgile really did see one in the woods!

SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
Hey, Virgile didn't even remember seeing this.
Plus, I'm sure he don't wanna be involved in all
this artifact business, so we'll just pocket it.

SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text:
This belongs to Virgile, so we probably
shouldn't just mosey off with it.

SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_GIMK_BOFO_WOODPILE_ARTEFACT_000_.text: I was thinking the same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
So this is where the inscription is, eh?
Also, that is one big rock—I wonder
where they hauled it in from?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Hmm, let me see... 'When the divine sword
was sealed in ice by the devil's power,
God used the might of spring light to...' Sorry, Miss Blair, but the word for 'melt'
has disappeared from the translation.
I think someone actually erased it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Seems someone really doesn't want us
melting the seal on the palace gates.
What should we do?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Wait, what does the translation matter?
It's the original inscription what has the
symbol, and nothing's erased there.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Oh, right! It looks like the symbol on the
inscription that corresponds to the erased
word is...this one! That must be our 'melt.'

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
I don't think we have enough
artifacts to make this shape.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_SANDRINE_KEYQUEST_000_.text:
Then our work ain't done.
Let's go find us more artifacts.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_00.text:
These must be the bathhouse
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_02.text:
That one looks like the seal, don't it?
Can you read what it says?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_03.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'These baths should all freeze!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_THERMAE_000_CUT_000_05.text:
Nothin' else here seems
all that interesting.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the watchtower
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_020.text:
That one looks like the seal, don't it?
Can you read what it says?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... It's really old language, so I'm not
entirely sure, but I think it says something
like, 'Freeze, you creepy peepers!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_040.text: Guess every world has its peepers.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_TOWER_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Nothin' else here seems
all that interesting.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_000.text:
These must be the church
ruins we heard about.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_020.text:
That one looks like the seal, don't it?
Can you read what it says?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Hmm... The words being used are really old,
so I'm not entirely sure, but I think it says
something like, 'Freeze, church!'

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_040.text:
What in tarnation?
Even the church had enemies!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_CHAPEL_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Nothin' else here seems
all that interesting.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_000.text: This is one of those artifacts, isn't it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I think we need a few more artifacts
before we can crack that seal open.
Let's visit some other locations.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RUINS_000_CUT_000_020.text:
This should be enough artifacts to open
the seal. Let's head back to the palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
That triangle on the palace
gates looks pretty familiar.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
That said, I don't think it's the
same triangle we're looking for.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
This is the palace of the final emperor.
It was built over a thousand years ago,
but everything's still completely intact.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So this is where the feller behind the curse
lives? Suppose we should pay him a visit,
maybe lift a curse while we're at it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
That isn't possible. Those gates won't open,
and even though those walls look climbable,
there are other invisible walls that block you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I sense great power here—everyone who lives
near this place can feel it. That's why we've
been worried all this time that the curse of
the final emperor is real.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
And this triangle may be the key to it all.
They really do seem to like us lately...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Well, we ain't gonna get anywhere till
we get more info about all this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_00.text:
My name's Bonnie, and I'm lookin' for
a special triangle. You found anything
like that in all your diggin' around?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_01.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_01.text:
By triangle, are you referring to the symbol
in the seal upon the final emperor's palace?
Please don't tell me you intend to break it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_04.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_04.text:
I'm guessin' that means
you ain't found it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_05.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_GABRIEL_100_CUT_010_05.text:
Since times long past, numerous people have
devoted their lives to breaking that seal,
myself among them. The key to unlocking it exists within
this world, but no one knows where.
That is all I can tell you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ROMAIN_100_CUT_000_000.text:
My name's Bonnie, and I'm lookin' for
a special triangle. You found anything
like that in all your diggin' around?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Huh? Why didn't it work?
What are we missing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Y'know, we saw a similar symbol to this back in
them ruins, but it was being used as part of a
freeze curse. Maybe this is a seal of freezin'?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
So could we maybe melt it?
If only I still had some matches...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Melt it... Oh! Because if there's a symbol
for freezin', then there might be a symbol
for meltin', right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
You're suggesting that overwriting the
freezing symbol with the melting one
may open the seal? That's really smart.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Er, but do either of you even know
what the melting symbol is?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Nah, we ain't wizards—but I reckon
it's somethin' we can research.
Got any idea where to start?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Absolutely! There's a library in Duvall,
and a museum in Varsailles.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You heard everyone's dreams about the final
emperor, Miss Blair, so what do you think?
What's your take on him now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
It's hard to get a real sense of the feller,
but people sure seemed haunted by them dreams.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
It's hard to get a real sense of the feller,
but people sure seemed to enjoy them dreams.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
It's hard to get a real sense of the feller;
people's dreams were all over the place.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like there's something awful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
there's something wonderful waiting for us!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
I know what you mean—which is why I feel
like things are about to get complicated.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_000_.text:
We've come this far, kid.
No reason not to go the distance.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
The gates to the palace are open!
How did you two do it!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
You said this seal was a thousand years old,
right, Alexandre? That would mean Quisstatium
has also been in existence all that time.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
And this seal was constructed in a way that
gave us the triangle when it was broken.
But why? Was the final emperor an enemy
of Quisstatium, perhaps?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I have no idea—but we got us a triangle,
which means there ain't no need to trouble
ourselves with the hows and whys anymore.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I must admit I'm surprised at how quickly
we acquired the triangle in this world.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
Maybe, but that just means we got no reason to
proceed any farther. Probably best to leave the
rest of this in the hands of its people.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_010_.text:
But Miss Blair, you were the one who
just said we had to go the distance!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_POSITIVE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_POSITIVE_100.text: The final emperor is you, kid. Right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_POSITIVE_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_POSITIVE_100.text:
I reckon you can manage the rest all on
your lonesome, Alexandre—what with
you bein' the final emperor and all.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_POSITIVE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_POSITIVE_100.text:
Just make sure you unfreeze the rest of
them people, okay? That's all we ask in
exchange for openin' that gate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Do you really believe that Alexandre
was the final emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Let's just say I hope I'm wrong.
I really, REALLY hope I'm wrong.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_020.text:
You and me both.
Well, farewell, Grelon.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: LastEmperor
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_000_030.text:
I am reborn! The throne of Grelon
belongs to me once more!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text:
I dunno what kind of trap,
but we don't dare walk into it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text:
If we know there's a trap,
could we use that somehow?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text:
That there's rookie thinkin', Formina.
Turnin' the tables on a well-prepared
opponent ain't easy. Best we withdraw.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text:
But what about all the people
who are still frozen?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text:
You'll take care of 'em after the survey team has
studied the exterior of the palace and prepared
themselves to study its interior. There's still
a heck of a lot left for you to do, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text:
For now, go find the survey team.
Tell them the rest is up to them.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_NEGATIVE_100.text: See you down the trail, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_010_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_010_000.text:
Do you think Alexandre
was a part of the trap?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_010_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_010_010.text:
I don't wanna know the answer to that,
so please don't be askin'.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_010_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_010_020.text: He seemed like such a sweet kid...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: Leia? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
I want to go with you to the final emperor's
palace. As a scholar, I have a great desire
to be one of the first to see it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: That's not a problem, is it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: We'll leave the rest to you, Leia.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
I sure am glad you showed up when you did.
Whatever comes next should be left in the
hands of the people of Grelon.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text:
This is as far as we go, Alexandre.
Do as Leia tells you, okay?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_100_.text: See you down the trail, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_000.text:
I was thinking we'd get our triangle
from that Leia person.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_010.text:
You might be right, but I expect we'd have
been in for a heck of a dust-up inside the
final emperor's palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_020_020.text: Then it's a good thing we didn't.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: Gabriel? What are you doing here!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
It seems I couldn't put my research behind me
after all; I just can't pass up a chance to
enter the final emperor's palace!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text: We'll leave the rest to you, Gabriel.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_200_.text:
This is as far as we go, Alexandre.
Do as Gabriel tells you, okay?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_030_000.text:
I was thinking we'd get our triangle
from that Gabriel person.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_300_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_300_.text: We'll leave the rest to you, Romain.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_300_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_300_.text: Looks like we'd better go with 'em.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_300_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FENCEGATE_100_CUT_300_.text:
This is as far as we go, Alexandre.
Do as Romain tells you, okay?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_040_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_040_000.text:
You sure it was a good idea to leave
all this in the hands of that Romain guy?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_040_010.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_040_010.text:
I thought he was the one holdin' the
triangle, but turns out I was wrong.
That's why I think we can trust him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_040_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_RETURN_000_CUT_040_020.text: I still can't help but worry...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I owe everything to the two of you.
Long have I sought those who possess
a power such as yours! Indeed, I am in awe of how effortlessly
you broke the seal that had flummoxed so
many for so long. You have my gratitude.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
So this was all part'a your plan, was it?
Well played, Alexandre—or should I say,
well played, Final Emperor?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
For the moment, I remain merely Alexandre.
But once I reclaim the power sealed away in
the palace, the true emperor shall be reborn!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text: So you ain't the emperor just yet.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Surely you won't attempt
to stand in my way?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, I don't got an opinion about the rebirth 
of the final emperor. I just want to know what
you intend to do with all them frozen folk.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
I fully intend to unfreeze them,
for they are valued subjects all. But I have another boon to beg: I would have you
destroy the being sealing away the emperor's
power, for I have not the ability to do so myself—
and without that, I cannot unfreeze the others.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_000_.text:
Not too mighty of an emperor, are you?
But hey, if it gets them folk unfrozen,
I got no reason to refuse.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
I trust you prefer me to express my
gratitude in the form of Alexandre?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
You really pulled the wool over our eyes.
Quite the little swindler, ain'tcha?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
This will be the last time I greet you in
this form. But should you visit Grelon again,
know that you will be most welcome here. Farewell to you both. I pray you meet with
great success in the rest of your mission.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_000_CUT_010_.text:
I wonder what this means for the future
of Grelon, but I suppose that's not really
any business of ours.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
There never was an 'Alexandre.' The boy you knew
was a mere phantom I created to manipulate people
into breaking the seal on my palace—a seal which
has now been very much sundered.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Actually, we got here by followin' our own choices.
I know you think you tricked us, but we ain't above
manipulatin' folk ourselves—because what happens
next ain't up to you, but us.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
What happens now is that I will arise again
to reign forevermore as the eternal emperor.
Do you truly claim this to be an action of your
choosing? That your will alone grants me life?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Wrong, darlin'. What ACTUALLY happens
next is that the emperor fails to rise again
and is sealed away for all eternity.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_000_.text:
Pathetic fools! You misunderstand the extent
of my power, and will pay for your hubris by
becoming a sacrifice in my resurrection rite!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
I wonder if that released everyone
from the final emperor's curse?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_010_CUT_010_.text:
So all along, Alexander was...
No. I can't even think about it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
No wonder you knew so much about the final
emperor, Leia—you ARE him. Heck, you even
pretended to be frozen so Alexandre would
bring you here! That's smart. Real smart.
So what happens now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing at all. Nothing is what happens.
Why, did you expect me to make some grand 
cackling proclamation about how the empire
will be reborn or the like? No, the legend of the final emperor is long over,
so I'm simply going to take some time and
figure out how to best use this power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
Of course. Well, except for the jerks who pissed
me off—they can stay frozen forever. ...Aaah ha ha! Kidding! Oh my god, your faces!
No, out of respect for all of Alexandre's
hard work, I intend to unfreeze everyone. This is all because of you, Alexandre.
You should be very proud.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text:
You got a good head on your shoulders, kid.
I was just thinking the exact same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_000_.text: *sigh* Do the three of you know what it means to 'overstep your bounds'? If not, please allow me to teach you right now—but know that the fee for the lesson will be your lives.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text:
...Alexandre? How strange. I was dreaming
I'd acquired the power of the final emperor.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: It was a dream, Leia. Just a dream.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_010_.text: Yep. Just a dream, all right.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Is it okay to leave things like this?
I mean, Leia doesn't remember anything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
We don't know whether the final emperor is
truly gone now or not. Heck, the feller might
even manage to come back one day.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
And when that happens, someone will
have to stand and face him.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Maybe. I don't know if I'm capable of that,
but I'd certainly try my best.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_020_CUT_020_.text:
Now you're talkin' like you got hair
on your chest! I reckon you're gonna
grow up into one heck of a man.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ahhh... At long last,
I am returned to my palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
No wonder you knew so much about the final
emperor, Gabriel—you ARE him. Heck, you even
pretended to be frozen so Alexandre would
bring you here! That's smart. Real smart.
So what happens now?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Nothing at all. Nothing is what happens.
Why, who could possibly believe that the final
emperor might appear in this day and age? But though the empire is naught but an
anachronism at this point, the power here
can still be wielded in the modern day—
and in very modern ways.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text: Are you going to unfreeze everyone?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, that's right. There are still people
trapped in the ice, aren't there? Well, if you wish it, Alexandre, I will restore
them all. Otherwise, they will remain as they
are now. This choice belongs to you alone—
such is the essence of power.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
This is... No. None of this feels right.
I'm starting to understand why this place was
sealed away in the first place, and I don't
think we should let the emperor's power out.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
You got a good head on your shoulders, kid.
I was just thinking the exact same thing.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_000_.text:
You people are more clever than I thought.
Only a fool would settle for being ruled by
such a power—the wise person chooses
to rule for themselves!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text: I never imagined it would end like this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
You did great, Alexandre. Ain't no point in
dwellin' on what's past; you need to focus
on what you can do next. I know Gabriel
would've wanted that for you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
But is the emperor's power really gone?
Or will it be restored one day?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
Supposin' that it does come back.
What would you do about it?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
I won't be ruled by that kind of thing.
I'll fight it with everything I have.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_021_CUT_020_.text:
If that's how you feel,
then I reckon Grelon's in good hands.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Don't play the victim with me, feller!
You're the one who sought that power;
keepin' the monster sealed away was
just the price you had to pay for it.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text: To protect Grelon, I must eliminate the infernal beings who come here from the Conjoined Worlds. This is why I require power—the blame for my actions rests entirely with you and your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Don't you put that evil on us—we just
came here lookin' for a darned triangle!
Heck, gettin' that was the only reason
we even unsealed your palace.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Ah, yes. The triangle. The mighty ever
seek the triangles, and I was no different. But in the end, it is never about the triangles.
It is about seeking power for its own sake—
and again, I was no different.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Guess this is the point where I'm supposed
to yell how we ain't never gonna be like you,
but we ain't got much credibility there.
So what'll it take to convince you?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You can destroy this vile flesh and release
my tormented soul from its sealing duties.
For I am so very weary...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
But if the soul of the final emperor has
been protecting Grelon this whole time,
who's going to do it when you're gone!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
You have wisdom enough to know
the answer to that question.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_000_.text:
Now, you infernal being!
Show me the nobility of your soul!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
The soul of the final emperor has been freed.
Now tell me, Alexandre: Do you know the
answer to the riddle he posed at the end?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
I do. All of us who live in Grelon have to
take on the responsibility of protecting it.
It won't be easy, but it has to be done.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
You really are wise beyond your years, kid.
Can you believe this plan of his was a
thousand years in the makin'? I mean,
I'm sorta surprised we won the day.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_100_CUT_010_.text:
It was all because of you and Miss Franklyn!
So farewell, and thank you for everything.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: I'll not let you escape this time!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_000_.text: Nope! You're dealing with us now!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
Shoot, we're back in the Twilight Area?
Guess we got ejected from Grelon.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_110_CUT_020_.text:
I sure hope Alexandre is okay—and all the
other people of Grelon, for that matter.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
So you're the final emperor, huh?
Kinda thought you'd be more of a
hot tamale, to be honest. Guess this
explains why they sealed you away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might
use your strength to save this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: No, Leia! That won't save anything!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: You mustn't judge a book by its cover, Alexandre. Besides, it will be me using this power.... Using it to save the world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
I admire your ambition! Now let us see
if your flesh is as strong as your will.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_000_.text: We gotta put a stop to this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Leia
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't do it, Alexandre... I couldn't
handle the power of the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
All right, Your Emperorness.
You ready to settle this?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text:
Impudent fools! Do you think that
was all of the power I possessed!?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_010_.text: Have a taste of my TRUE might!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
I wish I could say you've seen the last of
the final emperor, but I have no proof
of that. He may well return some day.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
No, that's okay. This is our problem now—so
if he does come back, we'll just defeat him.
We can't afford to let anyone be tempted
by that power ever again.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
In that case, kid,
we'll leave the rest to you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
I'm going to become strong just like
the two of you. Thank you so much.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_120_CUT_020_.text:
Heh. I look forward to seeing it.
Catch you down the trail, kid.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Who seeks my power? Who has managed to
overcome the trial and enter my palace?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
So you're the final emperor, huh?
Kinda thought you'd be more of a
hot tamale, to be honest. Guess this
explains why they sealed you away.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Grant me your power! I beg it of you!
Become one with me, that I might use
your strength to bring order to this world!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Power is an ugly thing, Alexandre.
Freedom and kindness are beautiful, yes,
but beautiful things cannot maintain order
in this world. Only force can do that.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
You believe yourself ready for my power?
Good. Let us see if that is truly the case.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text:
Nngh... So much...power...
surging through me!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_000_.text: We gotta put a stop to this!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.speaker: Gabriel
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't handle the power of the
final emperor, Alexandre... But you...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
I wish I could say you've seen the last of
the final emperor, but I have no proof
of that. He may well return some day.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
The lust for power is what kept the final
emperor alive for so long. That's something
we all have inside us—and something that
isn't ever going to change.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Alexandre, don't ever give in to
the final emperor's temptations.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
I hope I can resist—it helps that I don't
like what it turned the emperor into.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text:
Well, we've gotta ride on, kid.
Good luck to you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_121_CUT_020_.text: Thanks for everything, both of you.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
So my new form comes at last. Rejoice, for you
have been chosen! Your body has all I require:
compatibility with my soul, great magical power,
and the charm to inspire others. And now, my vessel, I would have you
offer unto me your flesh!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Remember well the fiend that haunts this
place, Alexandre. For when this occurs again
someday, I want you to be the one to save
the children of the future.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
As for you, demon, the new form you sought
once before stands before you now.
Come and claim it, if you can!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text: I've no need of senile old fools. Begone!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Do not fear, child.
Soon, you will be mine.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
And as for you, my otherworldly visitor,
I will brook no interference from your ilk!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Feller, I don't give a damn about your
nefarious goals. But when you raise hands
to a kid, you make yourself an enemy!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorSoul
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_000_.text:
Bwaaa ha ha ha! Bold words indeed!
But have you the power to back them up?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I sure wish I knew. I mean, it feels like it,
but I can't say if his power is really gone
from this world or not. I know this, though: one day, this world is going to
find itself in crisis again. And when that day
comes, it will be your battle to fight.
Romain knew it, and we know it, too.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text: But I can't! I'll never be like Romain!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Hey now. Don't give up on a battle
before it's even been fought.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I wish I had your confidence,
but...okay. I'll try.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
Now that the curse is lifted, I hope all
them frozen folk are feelin' a lot warmer.
But our duty here is done, pardner,
so you take care, all right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_200_CUT_010_.text:
I couldn't have done any of this without
you and Miss Franklyn. Thank you both.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: LastEmperorDemon
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
So you come to me once more, my new sacrificial
lamb. You have been chosen; this monster that was
once hailed as emperor will now use your flesh to gain
a vast new power. And indeed, perhaps I will need to remain in
this land for the rest of time in order to
keep such a monstrous form at bay.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I have heard these words before, Alexandre—on
the day my father sent me fleeing from this palace.
And I have spent every day since thinking about
how to release the emperor from his fate.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
It is time to follow in my father's footsteps.
Expel your exhausted self from that body and
claim mine instead! Then empower its flesh so
I might seize command of this world from you!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I don't understand what you're saying,
Romain! I don't understand at all!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text: Now it is your turn, Alexandre.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
I knew this was some sort of trap,
but I never figured YOU'D be the
one who set it, Romain.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.speaker: Romain
Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_000_.text:
Oh, you ain't wrong about that—
but I still can't walk away!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Where did I go wrong? All I ever wanted
was to release the final emperor...

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I am a sinful man. A horror.
There can be no absolution for this.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
The final emperor and Romain are both gone.
Did... Did I do the wrong thing?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
Not at all, darlin'. Because of you, the fiend
that was fused to the emperor is also gone,
which means the curse has been lifted. You did great, Alexandre. You won.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
...I guess I did, huh? I mean, it really does
feel like a weight's been lifted off me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_ICECASTLE_210_CUT_010_.text:
I'm afraid that this is where we
part ways, Alexandre. Take care.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: The door's locked. Should we break it down?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
A monster hidin' somewhere like this?
Guess no place is safe around here.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
The fiends are here because of the curse!
Grelon's a peaceful place, I swear!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: And that does it! Er, right?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text: Yep! We can use the cable car now.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_FUNICULARBATTLE_000_CU.text:
We can use this to get to the ski slope
or down to the bottom of the hill!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text: The ice is changing, Miss Blair!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
It's turnin' into a fiend!?
We're on it!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
I've never seen a real-life fiend before!
People said they roam around in caves and mines,
but I always thought those were just stories
made up to scare children.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_000_CUT_000.text:
It's probably connected to the
emperor's curse somehow.

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_010_CUT_000.text: Huh!? The ice is turning into a fiend again!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
Get a new trick, ice fiend!
You can't surprise me anymore!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_020_CUT_000.text:
If you let your guard drop,
you're as good as dead!

SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.speaker: Alexandre
SUB_W12_FUNC_BOFO_MELTBATTLE_030_CUT_000.text: Enough with this ice fiend business!

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Lemme ask you something, pardner:
You seen a strange triangle anywhere?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Marion
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_010.text:
They say the emperors of yore wielded
the power of triangles. But if I may ask,
what exactly is your purpose here?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Morgane
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_020.text:
They don't make triangular skis.
That's all I know.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Eric
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_030.text:
We don't run into that
sorta thing in the mines.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_050.speaker: Esperance
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_050.text:
Well, I have some triangle-shaped mints!
Is that what you're looking for?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Virgile
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_060.text:
All mountains are triangles, if you think
about it—and plenty got strange shapes.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Romain
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_070.text:
The world is full of triangles,
but they have nothing to do with me.

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Remi
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Can this strange triangle of yours liven up
the drudgery of my day-to-day existence?

SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Sandrine
SUB_W12_EVAR_BOFO_MIND_000_CUT_000_110.text: Open your eyes. Triangles are everywhere!
